trans-unit.target: -i，--input：它可以是单个文件，文件夹的路径，也可以是与Unix相似的widlcard表达式，例如/ path / to / files / dis00 *

https://github.com/ec-jrc/lisflood-utilities (this repository)
calendar: A recognized calendar identifier, like proleptic_gregorian, gregorian etc.

trans-unit.source: compression: Optional, integer number between 1 and 9, default 0 (no compression). If present the output nc file will be compressed at this level.
trans-unit.target: compression ：可选的1到9之间的整数，默认为0（不压缩）。如果存在，则输出nc文件将在此级别压缩。

least_significant_digit: Optional, integer number, default 2. From NetCDF4 documentation:

shortname: A short name for the variable

trans-unit.target: 注意：本指南假定您已使用pip工具安装了该程序。如果克隆的源代码，而不是，刚刚替补可执行 pcr2nc 与 python pcr2nc_script.py 是在克隆项目的根文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Project
Source code
compare is a package containing a set of simple Python classes that helps to compare netCDF, PCRaster and TSS files.
trans-unit.target: compare是一个软件包，其中包含一组简单的Python类，可帮助比较netCDF，PCRaster和TSS文件。

trans-unit.source: cutmaps is a tool to cut netcdf files in order to reduce size, using either
trans-unit.target: cutmaps是用于剪切netcdf文件以减小大小的工具，可以使用

trans-unit.source: pcr2nc is a tool to convert PCRaster maps to netCDF4 files.
trans-unit.target: pcr2nc是将PCRaster映射转换为netCDF4文件的工具。

trans-unit.source: A set of utilities for lisfloodutilities users. pcr2nc: Convert PCRaster files to netCDF; cutmaps: cut netCDF files;compare: to compare two set of netcdf files
trans-unit.target: pcr2nc.为lisfloodutilities用户提供的一套实用工具。将PCRaster文件转换为netCDF;cutmaps:剪切netCDF文件;compare:比较两组netcdf文件。

trans-unit.source: After the EV fitting, the tool estimates some further statistics from the long-term input file, including minimum, maximum, and different percentile maps. This part can be commented out if not of interest
trans-unit.target: 在EV拟合之后,该工具会从长期输入文件中估计一些进一步的统计数据,包括最小值、最大值和不同的百分位图。如果不感兴趣的话,可以将这部分注释出来。

trans-unit.source: An example of a metadata configuration file is the following
trans-unit.target: 元数据配置文件的一个例子是这样的

trans-unit.source: An extreme value fitting is performed on each pixel of the map, using L-moments and a 2-parameter Gumbel distribution. As option, the user can limit the analysis to a specific number of years. Also, one can use the option to remove from the fitting all values smaller than the long-term average. The fitting is performed only where at least 5 annual maxima are available, otherwise a NA is returned on the output map
trans-unit.target: 使用L-moments和2参数Gumbel分布对地图的每个像素进行极值拟合。作为选项,用户可以将分析限制在特定的年数。此外,还可以使用选项从拟合中删除所有小于长期平均值的数值。只有在至少有5个年度最大值的情况下,才会进行拟合,否则输出图上会返回一个NA。

trans-unit.source: How to run
If GDAL library fails to install, ensure to install the same package version of the C library you have on your system. You may also need to setup paths to gdal headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果GDAL库安装失败,请确保安装与你系统中的C库相同的包版本。你可能还需要设置GDAL头文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: If you don't use conda but a straight python3 virtualenv:
trans-unit.target: 如果你不用conda而是直接用python3 virtualenv。

trans-unit.source: If you use conda, create a new env (or use an existing one) and install gdal and lisflood-utilities:
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用conda,请创建一个新的环境(或使用现有的环境)并安装gdal和lisflood-utilities。

trans-unit.source: If your data only has a certain number of digits of precision (say for example, it is temperature data that was measured with a precision of 0.1 degrees), you can dramatically improve zlib compression by quantizing (or truncating) the data using the least_significant_digit keyword argument to createVariable. The least significant digit is the power of ten of the smallest decimal place in the data that is a reliable value. For example if the data has a precision of 0.1, then setting least_significant_digit=1 will cause data the data to be quantized using numpy.around(scale*data)/scale, where scale = 2**bits, and bits is determined so that a precision of 0.1 is retained (in this case bits=4). Effectively, this makes the compression 'lossy' instead of 'lossless', that is some precision in the data is sacrificed for the sake of disk space.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的数据仅具有一定数量的精度（例如，以0.1度的精度测量的温度数据），则可以通过使用minimum_significant_digit关键字量化（或截断）数据来显着改善zlib压缩createVariable的参数。最低有效位是数据中最小小数点后十位的幂，它是一个可靠的值。例如，如果数据的精度为0.1，则设置minimum_significant_digit = 1将使数据使用 numpy.around(scale*data)/scale 量化，其中 scale = 2**bits ，然后确定位，以保持0.1的精度（在这种情况下，位= 4）。有效地，这使压缩“有损”而不是“无损”，也就是说，为了节省磁盘空间而牺牲了一些精度。

trans-unit.source: In geographical section the only setting to configure is datum. Currently, pcr2nc supports the following list:
trans-unit.target: 在 geographical 区域中，唯一要配置的设置是 datum 。当前，pcr2nc支持以下列表：

trans-unit.source: Indices can also be passed as an argument (using -c argument instead of -m). Knowing your area of interest from your netCDF files, you can determine indices of the array and you can pass in the form imin_i_max:jmin_jmax.
trans-unit.target: 索引也可以作为参数传递（使用-c参数而不是-m）。从netCDF文件中知道您感兴趣的区域，可以确定数组的索引，并可以采用 imin_i_max:jmin_jmax 的形式传递。

trans-unit.source: Input as a Unix style pathname pattern expansion. The output will be a mapstack. Note that in this case the input argument must be contained in double quotes!
trans-unit.target: 输入为Unix样式的路径名模式扩展。输出将是一个地图堆栈。注意，在这种情况下，输入参数必须包含在双引号中！

trans-unit.source: Input as a folder containing PCRaster maps. In this case, the folder must contain ONLY PCraster files and the output will be a mapstack.
trans-unit.target: 输入为一个包含PCRaster地图的文件夹。在这种情况下,文件夹必须只包含PCraster文件,并且输出是一个地图栈。

trans-unit.source: Input as a path to a single map. In this case, the output won't be a mapstack.
trans-unit.target: 输入为一个单一地图的路径。在这种情况下,输出的不会是一个地图栈。

trans-unit.source: Install
Installation
Intro
Introduction

It takes the input file in NetCDF and extract the series of annual maxima. an optional number of warm-up years ($warmup_yrs) are excluded at the beginning of the data, to remove potential spin-up effect. Also the map of average value is computed
trans-unit.target: 它在NetCDF的输入文件中提取年度最大值系列,在数据开始时排除了一些可选的预热年($warmup_yrs),以消除潜在的自旋效应。同时计算平均值的地图

trans-unit.source: L-Moments: Analysis and Estimation of Distributions Using Linear Combinations of Order Statistics
trans-unit.target: L-Moments。使用线性组合秩序统计分析和估计分布情况

trans-unit.source: Lisflood
Lisflood Usecases
Lisflood Utilities

Lisflood Utilities is a set of tools to help LISFLOOD users (or any users of PCRaster/netCDF files) to execute some mundane tasks that are necessary to operate lisflood. Here's a list of utilities you can find in lisflood-utilities package.
trans-unit.target: Lisflood Utilities是一套帮助lisflood用户(或任何PCRaster/netCDF文件的用户)执行一些操作lisflood所需的普通任务的工具。下面是你可以在lisflood-utilities包中找到的实用程序列表。

Model docs
NetCDFWriter
Other useful resources
Otherwise, ensure you have properly installed the following software:
trans-unit.target: 否则,请确保您已正确安装以下软件。

trans-unit.source: Output return level maps (corresponding to user-selected years of recurrence interval) are saved in a netcdf file (return_levels.nc) and as ascii files. If a clone map in PCRaster format is provided, maps are also saved in PCRaster (return level maps and parameters of the Gumbel distribution)
trans-unit.target: 输出的返回水平图(对应于用户选择的复发间隔年)保存在netcdf文件(return_levels.nc)和ascii文件中,如果提供PCRaster格式的克隆图,地图也保存在PCRaster中(返回水平图和Gumbel分布参数)。如果提供了PCRaster格式的克隆图,地图也保存在PCRaster中(返回水平图和Gumbel分布的参数)。

The Gfit2 tool performs the following steps:
The easy way is to use conda environment as they incapsulate C dependencies as well, so you wouldn't need to install libraries.
trans-unit.target: 简单的方法是使用conda环境,因为他们也封装了C语言的依赖,所以你不需要安装库。

trans-unit.source: The following command will cut all netcdf files inside /workarea/Madeira/lai/ folder and produced files will be writte in current folder. The cookie-cutter that will be used is /workarea/Madeira/maps/MaskMap/Bacia_madeira.nc. This file is a mask (boolean map with 1 only in the area of interest) where cutmaps takes the bounding box from. The mask can also be in PCRaster format.
trans-unit.target: 以下命令将剪切/ workarea / Madeira / lai /文件夹中的所有netcdf文件，并将生成的文件写入当前文件夹中。将使用的cookie裁切器为/workarea/Madeira/maps/MaskMap/Bacia_madeira.nc。此文件是一个遮罩（感兴趣区域中仅1的布尔映射），其中cutmaps从中获取边界框。掩码也可以采用PCRaster格式。

trans-unit.source: The package contains convenient classes for reading/writing:
trans-unit.target: 包中包含了方便阅读/写作的类。

trans-unit.source: The tool Gfit2 was created to extract flood warning thresholds from a map stack of daily discharge for several years, given in NetCDF format. It is designed to work with any other variable as well as with different sampling (sub- or super- daily)
trans-unit.target: Gfit2工具的创建是为了从NetCDF格式的多年日排量地图堆中提取洪水预警阈值。它被设计为可用于任何其他变量以及不同的采样(次日或超日)。

trans-unit.source: This section is optional and is only required if the output file is a mapstack (a timeseries of georeferenced 2D arrays) In this section you have to configure units and calendar.
trans-unit.target: 本部分是可选的，并且仅在输出文件是mapstack（地理参考二维数组的时间序列）时才需要。在本部分中，您必须配置 units 和 calendar 。

trans-unit.source: This tool accepts a template/cookie-cutter as input, along with a list of files to cut, and produces cut netcdf files.
trans-unit.target: 该工具接受一个模板/cookie-cutter作为输入,以及要切割的文件列表,并生成切割后的netcdf文件。

trans-unit.source: Time section
To check which version of GDAL libraries you have installed on your computer, use gdal-config
trans-unit.target: 要检查你的计算机上安装了哪个版本的GDAL库,使用GDAL-config

trans-unit.source: Unless the input is a single file, the resulting NetCDF4 file will be a mapstack according to a time dimension.
trans-unit.target: 除非输入的是单个文件,否则生成的NetCDF4文件将是一个按照时间维度的地图栈。

trans-unit.source: Usage
Usage:
User guide
Variable section
What does the tool do
Writing metadata configuration file
You need to have installed the following:
a bounding box of coordinates
a bounding box of matrix indices
a mask map (either PCRaster or netCDF format) or
a path to a folder where to write cut files.
trans-unit.target: 写入剪切文件的文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: a textfile with a list of filepaths for files to cut or alternatively a path to a folder containing netCDF files to cut
trans-unit.target: 一个文本文件,包含要剪切的文件路径列表,或者包含要剪切的netCDF文件的文件夹路径。

trans-unit.source: alternatively, coordinates bounding box in the form xmin_xmax:ymin_ymax
trans-unit.target: 或者,坐标边界框的形式为xmin_xmax:ymin_ymax。

trans-unit.source: alternatively, matrix indices in the form xmini_xmaxi:ymini_ymaxi or
trans-unit.target: 或者,矩阵指数的形式为xmini_xmaxi:ymini_ymaxi或

trans-unit.source: an existing boolean area mask
convert a single map into a NetCDF4 file
